basics.name: Dr. Ghader Manafiazar
basics.label: Assistant Professor, Sustainable Livestock Production System
basics.summary: Dr. Ghader Manafiazar specializes in sustainable livestock production, focusing on feed efficiency, greenhouse gas emissions, and fitness traits in livestock using innovative techniques such as nutrition, genetics/genomics, and machine learning.

work.name: Dalhousie University
work.summary: Focus on sustainable livestock production systems, with research involving feed efficiency and greenhouse gas emissions.

work.name: BeefBooster Inc.
work.summary: Involved in research and development to improve the genetic and production traits in beef cattle.

work.name: University of Alberta
work.summary: Conducted research in genetics and genomics, focusing on livestock.

work.name: University of Alberta
work.summary: Postdoctoral research focused on livestock genetics and genomics.

work.name: University of Alberta
work.summary: Assisted in research projects focused on livestock production.

work.name: West Azarbaijan Agriculture Research Center
work.summary: Conducted research on various agricultural projects in Iran.

volunteer.organization: Agriculture, Food and Nutritional Science Department (AFNS)
